Model summary for k-means clustering

Source: R/model_performance.kmeans.R
model_performance.kmeans.Rd

Model summary for k-means clustering

# S3 method for kmeans
model_performance(model, verbose = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

model

Object of type kmeans.
verbose

Toggle off warnings.
...

Arguments passed to or from other methods.

Examples

# a 2-dimensional example
x <- rbind(
  matrix(rnorm(100, sd = 0.3), ncol = 2),
  matrix(rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 0.3), ncol = 2)
)
colnames(x) <- c("x", "y")
model <- kmeans(x, 2)
model_performance(model)
#> # Indices of model performance
#> 
#> Sum_Squares_Within | Sum_Squares_Between | Sum_Squares_Total | Iterations
#> -------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> 71.530             |              16.523 |            55.007 |      1.000
